医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
HPV 在男性生育能力中的作用：精子质量和氧化应激的新数据研究结果表明，HR-HPV 感染会影响精子健康，增加氧化应激并改变细胞因子水平，强调 HPV 对男性生育能力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/The-role-of-HPV-in-male-fertility-New-data-on-sperm-quality-and-oxygen-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/The-role-of-HPV-in-male-fertility-New-data-on-sperm-quality-and-oxygen-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebc84430-a179-4f11-9287-980a859a8e95 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 04:51:00 -0400 The role of HPV in male fertility: New data on sperm quality and oxidative stress
索马鲁肽可减少心力衰竭患者的主要不良心血管事件在最近的一项大规模临床试验中，索马鲁肽有望降低肥胖心力衰竭患者的心血管风险，改善预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Semaglutide-shown-to-cut-major-adverse-cardioangio-events-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Semaglutide-shown-to-cut-major-adverse-cardioangio-events-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4da8c072-aaa0-4e92-8274-6d2ee52cbdaf Tue, 27 Aug 2024 04:21:00 -0400 Semaglutide shown to cut major adverse cardiovascular events in heart failure patients
探索 OTUB1 对蛋白质稳定性和动脉粥样硬化病理生理学的影响该研究调查了去泛素酶 OTUB1 在动脉粥样硬化背景下血管平滑肌细胞 (VSMC) 中的作用，动脉粥样硬化是一种以动脉中脂质堆积和斑块形成为特征的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Exploring-OTUB1s-influence-on- Protein-stability-and-atherosclerosis-pathophysiology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Exploring-OTUB1s-influence-on- Protein-stability-and-atherosclerosis-pathophysiology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd25b298-c25b-4ba0-a02f-d90d58d37774 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 03:02:03 -0400 Exploring OTUB1's influence on protein stability and atherosclerosis pathophysiology
与 COVID-19 相比，登革热会增加心脏和神经系统并发症的风险新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU Singapore）领导的一项全国性研究结果显示，与感染 COVID-19 的人相比，感染登革热并康复的人在大约一年后更有可能面临长期健康并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Dengue-increases-risk-of-heart-and-neurological-complications-compared-to-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Dengue-increases-risk-of-heart-and-neurological-complications-compared-to-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e19e5a3-d410-4a5e-9c22-88a95b657c7b Tue, 27 Aug 2024 02:26:03 -0400 Dengue increases risk of heart and neurological complications compared to COVID-19
CHEK2变异在癌症风险评估中的意义2024 年 7 月 10 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“基因型很重要：种系 CHEK2 变异的个性化筛查建议”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/The-significance-of-CHEK2-variants-in-cancer-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/The-significance-of-CHEK2-variants-in-cancer-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a53f9d26-fa26-48f4-9a65-2588a03c7890 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 02:22:08 -0400 The significance of CHEK2 variants in cancer risk assessment
研究确定 Gα13 是 ER+ 乳腺癌的关键肿瘤抑制因子在寻找对抗乳腺癌的新方法时，杜克大学-新加坡国立大学医学院的科学家们揭示了一种通常与癌症生长相关的蛋白质的惊人作用。他们发现，在雌激素受体阳性（ER+）乳腺癌中，这种蛋白质反而充当肿瘤抑制因子。 ER+ 乳腺癌约占所有乳腺癌诊断的 80%，但近 50% 被诊断患有该病的女性在初次治疗后会复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-identizes-Gceb113-as-a-key-tumor-suppressor-in-ER2b-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Study-identizes-Gceb113-as-a-key-tumor-suppressor-in-ER2b-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57e69a6a-7872-4505-927f-bf58d0b08daf Tue, 27 Aug 2024 02:08:04 -0400 Study identifies Gα13 as a key tumor suppressor in ER+ breast cancer
肠道微生物群在轮状病毒疫苗功效中发挥着关键作用佐治亚州立大学生物医学科学研究所的研究人员表示，某些类型的肠道细菌可能会阻碍轮状病毒疫苗的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Gut-microbiota-plays-a-ritic-role-in-rotavirus-vaccine-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Gut-microbiota-plays-a-ritic-role-in-rotavirus-vaccine-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9afa70d-3ace-4be9-bf2f-c5fc88e35308 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 01:50:48 -0400 Gut microbiota plays a critical role in rotavirus vaccine efficacy
新方法揭示隐藏的癌症目标有效地对抗癌症通常涉及阻止癌细胞增殖，这需要了解细胞赖以生存的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-method-uncovers-hidden-cancer-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/New-method-uncovers-hidden-cancer-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90b3f070-7094-41cc-a2ee-56ec19f8ff52 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 01:49:11 -0400 New method uncovers hidden cancer targets
一种光合作用生产高价值化合物的新方法研究人员以进化为指导原则，成功地设计了细菌-酵母杂交体，以进行光合碳同化，产生细胞能量并支持酵母生长，而无需使用葡萄糖或甘油等传统碳原料。通过改造光合蓝藻使其在酵母细胞内共生，细菌-酵母杂交体可以产生重要的碳氢化合物，为非石油能源、其他合成生物学应用和进化实验研究铺平了新的生物技术途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/A-novel-approach-to-photosynthetic-product-of-high-value-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/A-novel-approach-to-photosynthetic-product-of-high-value-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a294d97-4f00-41b6-83c5-80a600372a14 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 01:45:00 -0400 A novel approach to photosynthetic production of high-value compounds
计算工具揭示病毒蛋白的 3D 结构这些快速变化意味着研究人员仍在尝试了解多种病毒蛋白以及它们如何增强病毒的感染能力。对于开发新的或更好的抗病毒疗法至关重要的知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Computational-tools-reveal-3D-structs-of-viral- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Computational-tools-reveal-3D-structs-of-viral- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=674f832d-88da-4c74-a36e-03dfc47ceb89 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 01:43:35 -0400 Computational tools reveal 3D structures of viral proteins
